sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ChartSectionUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>ChartSectionUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ChartSectionUtil = Class.create();
ChartSectionUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	filterChartsBySectionType:function(){
				
		var sectionType= current.type;
		if(sectionType == "single_score"){
			return "type=report^report.type=single_score^NQtype=PA";
		}else if(sectionType == "report"){
			return "type=report^report.type!=single_score";
		}
		return "";
	},
    type: 'ChartSectionUtil'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-09-01 08:00:25</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2c9d7836c72f3300fc3a2aa9b8c26068</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ChartSectionUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Mobile Applet Launcher" source="com.glide.sg.applet_launcher">cced74cb6d2220100acb70b353433000</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2c9d7836c72f3300fc3a2aa9b8c26068</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-09-01 08:00:25</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>420</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
